Top Features:

Free Bulk Messaging: Send bulk messages on WhatsApp at no cost.
Attachment Support: Add attachments to your messages.
Real-Time Updates: Receive real-time updates and notifications.
Detailed Reports: Get detailed delivery reports for your campaigns.
CSV Preview: Preview uploaded CSV files in real-time.
No Contact Saving: Send messages without saving contacts.

Why Choose Us?

Completely Free: No charges for features.
User-Friendly: Intuitive and easy to use interface.
Affordable Premium: Cost-effective premium features.
Customer Support: 24/7 live customer support.

Join us and take advantage of the best tool for WhatsApp marketing. By downloading the extension, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
